title: Innistrad: Crimson Vow Official Cinematic Trailer – Magic: The Gathering
author: Magic: The Gathering
description:
Eternal night falls over Innistrad, and Olivia Voldaren prepares to marry and claim ultimate power over the vampire elite. Play now on MTG Arena and fear what you become – http://InnistradCrimsonVow.com


Available Everywhere - Nov 19



#MTG #MTGCrimson #MagicTheGathering
